# discord-embed-footer

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                                                          | Type                                            | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `footerImage` | `footer-image` | The image to use next to the footer text.                                                            | `string`                                        | `undefined` |
| `timestamp`   | `timestamp`    | The timestamp to use for the message date. When supplying a string, the format must be `01/31/2000`. | `Date \| null \| number \| string \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `twentyFour`  | `twenty-four`  | Whether to use 24-hour format for the timestamp.                                                     | `boolean`                                       | `false`     |
